description:
一分钟音频，有趣又省时：

>>下载本期科学60秒<<

The other afternoon I hit a classic mid-afternoon slump. Sleepy and sluggish, I grabbed for a bit of chocolate. But I probably should have had egg whites or maybe a piece of steak. Because a recent study in mice has found that it’s protein, not sugar, that provides the perk.不久前的一个下午，我又困倒了。充满倦意、行动迟缓的我抓了一块巧克力塞进嘴里。但也许我应该吃一些蛋白或是一块牛排。因为一项最近的研究发现，能使小白鼠亢奋的是蛋白质而非糖份。 
Brain cells called orexin cells secrete a stimulant that makes us energetic and tells the body to burn calories. If the cells’ activity decreases, narcolepsy or sudden sleepiness, is the result. The work is published in the journal Neuron. [Mahesh M. Karnani et al., "Activation of Central Orexin/Hypocretin Neurons by Dietary Amino Acids"]作为脑细胞的一种，阿里新细胞分泌一种刺激让我们充满活力，并给身体指示燃烧卡路里。如果这种细胞的活力下降，就会犯困瞌睡。这份研究发表于“神经元”期刊。 
Scientists marked orexin cells in mice brains so they would fluoresce. Then they tracked the cells’ activity after feeding the mice different kinds of food. 科学家在小白鼠脑子里标记了阿里新细胞，使它们荧光可见。然后通过喂食给小白鼠不同的食物，来观察这些细胞的活动情况。 
Turns out that glucose blocks the function of the orexin cells. This effect might be the main reason for the desired post-lunch siesta. But the researchers also found that amino acids stop the glucose action, keeping the cells active and the mice alert. So next time I get that 3 p.m. slow down, I’ll have an egg. If I’m alert enough to remember. 于是发现葡萄糖阻碍了阿里新细胞的正常功能。这可能就是午后犯困的主要原因了。但研究者也发现氨基酸能阻止葡萄糖的行动，保持阿里新细胞有活力，从而使小白鼠警醒。所以下次在下午3点犯困的时候，我会吃个鸡蛋。前提是我还足够清醒能记住这个研究结果。

description:
1. In a sudden ______ of anger, the man tore up everything within reach.
[A] attack
[B] burst
[C] split
[D] blast

2. ______ she realized it was too late to go home.
[A] No sooner it grew dark than
[B] Hardly did it grow dark that
[C] Scarcely had it grown dark than
[D] It was not until dark that

3. In Britain people ______ four million tons of potatoes every year.
[A] swallow
[B] dispose
[C] consume
[D] exhaust

4. I'd ______ his reputation with other farmers and business people in the community, and then make a decision about whether or not to approve a loan.
[A] take into account
[B] account for I
[C] make up for
[D] make out

5. It is essential that these application forms ______ back as early as possible.
[A] must be sent
[B] will be sent
[C] are sent
[D] be sent

解析：

1. [B] 名词辨析
a burst of：指感情的一时冲动。
句意：暴怒之下，那个男人把所有抓得到的东西都扯成了碎片。
[A] attack 攻击，非难 [B] burst 爆发 [C]split 分裂，裂片 [D] blast一阵，一股，爆炸

2.[D] 句型搭配
It was not until…that的意思是： 直到……才……。No sooner … than, hardly …when, scarcely…when的意思都是：一……就、刚……就，而且后面的句子要倒装。
句意：直到天黑了，她才意识到太晚了无法回家。

3. [C] 动词辨析
根据句意，空格处应该是吃掉、消耗的意思。
句意：在英国，人们每年要消费400万吨马铃薯。
[A]swallow咽，吞没 [B] dispose 布置，除去 [C]consume 消耗 [D] exhaust用尽，使筋疲力尽

4. [A] 短语辨析
根据句意，his reputation是make a decision要考虑的因素之一，所以，选择A。
句意：我会把他在这个社区其他的农场主和商人那里的声誉考虑在内，然后再决定是否批准他的贷款。
[A] take into account考虑 [B]account for说明、占决、得分 [C]make up for 补偿 [D] make out书写、拼凑、说明、 设法应付、 理解、辨认出

5.[D] 虚拟语气
It’s essential后面的从句要用“should + 原形”的虚拟语气，其中should可以省略。类似的形容词的结构还很多，如：important, necessary等。
句意：必须尽早寄回这些申请表。
